name: TheBonFyre
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This briefing will keep you informed of all of The Bonfyre news! What happened today, what will happen tomorrow, and what the future may hold!

Come check out the whole community here: https://thebonfyre.tv
